short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A forum avatar-replacer based on a remote canonical image source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This requests avatar replacements for people on a forum.

It has a user-editable list of servers to try in order for images and a hardcoded forum to replace images on. It is intended to be used with the game "Skyrates", at forum.skyrates.net, but that's not a fundamental limitation of the code.

Brought to you by The System of the World.
